name: Loki: Agent of Asgard #7
summary: - Victor Von Doom has Loki sentenced to death - for the crimes of his future self! - But with the Red Skull drowning Doom, Latveria and the entire world in a wave of unstoppable telepathic hate... - ...is there even a future left to save?

relations.title: Loki: Agent of Asgard Volume 2: I Cannot Tell a Lie
